Package killdrluckygame.view

Interface WorldViewInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
WorldViewImpl
public interface WorldViewInterface
The WorldViewInterface interface represents the view component of the Dr. Lucky game. It defines methods for interacting with the game's graphical user interface (GUI) and displaying information to the player.
